name: 2024 2nd Asia Conference on Advances in Image Processing
content: Journal: Accepted papers after undergoing a preliminary review and rigorous peer review will be published in the Journal of Image and Graphics (ISSN: 2301-3699 (Print); 2972-3973 (Online)), which will be indexed by Scopus (Since 2021), CNKI, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
